page.title: 13Bugbrooke Surgery
page.content: In Bugbrooke there are three doctors: Dr.D.L.S.Paine,Dr.D.K.Dutta,Dr.A.Clark. They have approximately 2000 patients each from an area larger than our grid. There is one Health Visitor who is attached to the practice,and her job is concerned with pre-school children and the elderly. There is one practice nurse who works 2 1/2 hours daily.There is also a chiropodist who works 1/2 day weekly. This is a rural practice and is over a mile from the nearest chemist (in fact a lot more),so it also has a busy dispensary. The three practices are separate although they share a common building. Most other health care is provided in the nearby town of Northampton.
